version_description:
- removed VK support
- dark theme
- repeat single track
- sleep timer
- lots of other improvements

- iPhone X support.
- iOS 11 Files app, drag & drop and file import.
- Fix control center issues with iOS 11.
- Support folder uploads via WiFi.
- Rename playlists and folders (with longpress).
- Scroll-to-bottom button.
- Sort by date option (in settings).
- Fix artist search.
- Support shuffle and repeat from car audio/whatever.
- More small improvements and bugfixes.
- Still no VK support

- Fix issue when uploading via WiFi on some browsers
- Option to hide playlist end on the right
- Option to recover accidentally cleared playlist
- Option to turn off album cover download
- Search will return all matches instead of first 20
- Fix audiosession won't release when music is not played
- Support for radio streams (.m3u, .pls, .xspf)
- More small improvements and bugfixes

- Cloud storage support (Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive, Yandex.Disk).
- Useful “Now Playing” button.
- Fix conflicts with camera/instagram/...
- Fix issues when rapidly switching tracks.
And huge amount of other improvements and fixes.

- Support for Apple Music
- Artists/Albums/Songs filter for iTunes/Apple Music
- Option to change playback speed (audiobook listeners will love this)
- Search improvements
- Huge number of bugs fixed and other improvements

1.9.2
- Fix support for iOS 9 and below
- Minor improvements

1.9.1
- Support for Apple Music
- Artists/Albums/Songs filter for iTunes/Apple Music
- Option to change playback speed (audiobook listeners will love this)
- Search improvements
- Huge number of bugs fixed and other improvements

- Launch time improvements.
- Restore playback folder/post/playlist upon restart.
- Search history.
- Actions for folder/playlist.
- Hide empty playlist end.
- iOS 7 support (hopefully).
Many more minor bugfix and improvements.

- “More” actions button for every track
- Playback history
- Import extension
- Create folder and move actions
- Option to slow down tracks
- Bugfixes

- “More” actions button for every track
- Playback history
- Import extension
- Create folder and move actions
- Option to slow down tracks
- Bugfixes

- Bugfixes for crashes and everything.
- Improve import workflow.

Thank you for reporting issues!

- Fix import extension
- Bugfixes and other minor improvements

- Fix for iOS 11 and below
- Fix import extension
- Bugfixes and other minor improvements

- Fix for iOS 11 and below (again)
- Fix import extension
- Bugfixes and other minor improvements

- Support for iOS 13 Dark Mode
- Long-press actions on tracks
- Fix Google Drive support
- Many bugfixes and improvements

- Chinese localization
- Improvements for album covers
- Dark icon!
- Other improvements

- Bugfixes
- Option to display album titles on Lock Screen

- Google Drive fixed finally (you may need to login out/in)
- Other bugfixes
- Some kind of video support
Thank you for your emails!
